        We are a full service salon located in 
          New Bedford, MA. 
          We provide the 
          following beauty services:  
          Hair Cuts     Hair Color
Manicures     Pedicures
Nail Services     Waxing
Massage     Skin Care
and more! We offer special rates on weddings and 
          other special events.  Please call us at
          508.995.2205 to schedule an 
          appointment today, or click "Book Appointment" above!
Sundays.............closed
          Mondays............closed
          Tuesdays..............10-8
          Wednesdays...........9-8
          Thursdays.............10-8
          Fridays..................10-6
          Saturdays................9-3
